items.sentence: Tom wished he could play the mandolin as well as Mary.
I knew that if I let Tom leave, he\'d never come back.
I know that Tom isn\'t going to pay me for doing this.
I\'m likely going to have a difficult time doing that.
Tom isn\'t going to be angry if Mary doesn\'t do that.
Tom dragged himself out of bed and put on his clothes.
Tom and Mary sit next to one another in science class.
Tom and Mary stared at each other for several seconds.
Tom and Mary took a long walk through the countryside.
There\'s something I\'ve been wanting to ask you, Tom.
